sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { getUserType } from '../../models/GetUserType'; import IconButton from '@material-ui/core/IconButton'; import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete'; import EditIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Edit'; // ---------------------------------- This Is The 'Vacation' Component ---------------------------------- // export default function VacationComponent (props: any) { return (

{props.vacation.vacationName}

{props.vacation.startDate}

-

{props.vacation.endDate}

{props.vacation.vacationPrice} $

{props.vacation.vacationDescription}
{/* If The Current User Is An Admin, Show Him The Control Buttons */} {getUserType() === "ADMIN" ?
{props.onVacationDeleteAttempt(props.vacation)}} > {props.onVacationEditAttempt(props.vacation)}}>
:
{props.validateVacationIsNotLikedByTheUser(props.vacation) ?
{props.onVacationFollowAttempt(props.vacation)}}>
:
{props.onVacationFollowAttempt(props.vacation)}}>
}

{props.vacation.followersCount}

}
) }
